pageTitle: Have you been employed and paid National Insurance over the last 2 to 3 years?
label: Have you been employed and paid National Insurance over the last 2 to 3 years?
hint:
You may be eligible if you’ve paid enough National Insurance contributions (opens in new tab), usually over the last 2 to 3 years. National Insurance credits (opens in new tab) can also count.

If you’re not sure, you can still apply for New Style ESA.
error: Select yes if you’ve been employed and paid National Insurance over the last 2 to 3 years
